channel.title: NebulaPk 637 || 2011 Pking || PVP & Bounty Hunter Targets
channel.description:
[Center] [IMG]http://www.nebulapk.com/banner.gif[/img]
[u][b]Links[/b][/u] Homepage - www.nebulapk.com Forums - www.nebulapk.com/forums Webclient - www.nebulapk.com/webclient Download - www.nebulapk.com/download
NebulaPk is the bring back of 2011 pking in runescape. We are a 637 revision loading a 639 cache. The main aim of this server is to experience a great time pking back in 2011 days. We are VPS hosted and we are based just on pking. Along with it being a 2011 bring back, we do have custom features like city pking and a custom interface to help players get around the server and exchange pk points for tokens to spend in the store. We have introduced summoning of familiars to a high standard, we have the main familiars that was used in pking in 2011 also in multi zones.[/Font]
[B][U]Main Features[/B]
- 100% Character designing, its good to look different than others ey? - Bounty Hunter Targets with the artifacts drops according to your EP (earned potential). High ep = better artifact drops. - Earning potential system as mentioned above. - City pking as safe pking zones to practise pking skills. - Randomised drops such as barrows equipment, dragon, rune and amulets to help players gain money while having fun pking in safe areas. - 2011 Combat system, [ Damage Soaking, Poisioning, Corrected & improved special attacks ]. - Pkp system, vote points system from voting. - The achievements tab is customised to show : Ingame rank, pkp, vote points, total kills, safe kills, safe deaths, unsafe kills and unsafe deaths - 10 second pvp safezone timer, you have a 10 second countdown once you leave wilderness ( if you were just in combat ) until you are in complete safe. - Customised titles done via the client ( Such as, veteran, legendary, lord, vyrelord, the maginificant etc ) - Donator symbols done via the client - Summoning shop, pkp points ( pvp tokens as currency -> You need to exchange your pk points for them ), vote store ( vote tickets used ) Artifacts store - Summoning of familiars with correct scroll uses ( Albino rat, Bunyip, Compostmound, Firetitan, Geysertitan, Obisidan golem, Packyack, Spirit spider / mosquito & terror bird. Steeel titan, thorny snaoil, unicorn stallion, War tortoise, Wolpertinger) - Diagonal combat has been fixed ( your player will automaticall move side to side instead of fighting diagonally ). Applies to melee combat ( not magic / range) - As your hitpoints go down, it will show in your skills tab - Fully functional Ring Of Life and the Phoenix Necklace done. If you are wearing both, phoenix necklace will activate first. - You can't attack your own familiar what so ever. - Custom client background with customised buttons to help players open up the forums much quicker - Dicegame fully functional
This list could keep going, why don't you hop on nebulapk and discover the rest yourself?
[IMG]http://puu.sh/3TRWY.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/VuVTmNe.png?1?4251[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3TS6H.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/izsEn9D.png?1?3376[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/wYalwoi.png?1?3324[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ipFqjHj.png?1?3231[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i5NMBLG.png?1?9813[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yqRpsty.png?1?9678[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ydXyMSr.png?1?4872[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3TU6D.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://puu.sh/3TU7n.jpg[/img]
[B][U]Credits & Thanks[/U][/B] - Dementhium team - Myself ( Sal ) - Wildking72 Aka Wildskiller - AeroPk - Sixpack
[/Center]

item.title: NebulaPk 637 || 2011 Pking || PVP & Bounty Hunter Targets
item.dc:creator: @nebulapk nebulapk
item.description:
@nebulapk wrote:

[Center]

Links
Homepage - www.nebulapk.com
Forums - www.nebulapk.com/forums
Webclient - www.nebulapk.com/webclient
Download - www.nebulapk.com/download

NebulaPk is the bring back of 2011 pking in runescape. We are a 637 revision loading a 639 cache. The main aim of this server is to experience a great time pking back in 2011 days. We are VPS hosted and we are based just on pking. Along with it being a 2011 bring back, we do have custom features like city pking and a custom interface to help players get around the server and exchange pk points for tokens to spend in the store. We have introduced summoning of familiars to a high standard, we have the main familiars that was used in pking in 2011 also in multi zones.[/Font]

[U]Main Features

  • 100% Character designing, its good to look different than others ey?
  • Bounty Hunter Targets with the artifacts drops according to your EP (earned potential). High ep = better artifact drops.
  • Earning potential system as mentioned above.
  • City pking as safe pking zones to practise pking skills.
  • Randomised drops such as barrows equipment, dragon, rune and amulets to help players gain money while having fun pking in safe areas.
  • 2011 Combat system, [ Damage Soaking, Poisioning, Corrected & improved special attacks ].
  • Pkp system, vote points system from voting.
  • The achievements tab is customised to show : Ingame rank, pkp, vote points, total kills, safe kills, safe deaths, unsafe kills and unsafe deaths
  • 10 second pvp safezone timer, you have a 10 second countdown once you leave wilderness ( if you were just in combat ) until you are in complete safe.
  • Customised titles done via the client ( Such as, veteran, legendary, lord, vyrelord, the maginificant etc )
  • Donator symbols done via the client
  • Summoning shop, pkp points ( pvp tokens as currency -> You need to exchange your pk points for them ), vote store ( vote tickets used ) Artifacts store
  • Summoning of familiars with correct scroll uses ( Albino rat, Bunyip, Compostmound, Firetitan, Geysertitan, Obisidan golem, Packyack, Spirit spider / mosquito & terror bird. Steeel titan, thorny snaoil, unicorn stallion, War tortoise, Wolpertinger)
  • Diagonal combat has been fixed ( your player will automaticall move side to side instead of fighting diagonally ). Applies to melee combat ( not magic / range)
  • As your hitpoints go down, it will show in your skills tab
  • Fully functional Ring Of Life and the Phoenix Necklace done. If you are wearing both, phoenix necklace will activate first.
  • You can’t attack your own familiar what so ever.
  • Custom client background with customised buttons to help players open up the forums much quicker
  • Dicegame fully functional

This list could keep going, why don’t you hop on nebulapk and discover the rest yourself?
